mapper.select: select user_nickname,user_email,user_passwd,gender,age_group,date_of_birth,location,interesting1_large_category ,interesting2_large_category,interesting3_large_category,interesting4_large_category,job,sign_up_date,withdrawal_date,score,r from (select user_nickname,user_email,user_passwd,gender,age_group,date_of_birth,location,interesting1_large_category ,interesting2_large_category,interesting3_large_category,interesting4_large_category,job,sign_up_date,withdrawal_date,score,rownum r from (select user_nickname,user_email,user_passwd,gender,age_group,date_of_birth,location,interesting1_large_category ,interesting2_large_category,interesting3_large_category ,interesting4_large_category,job,sign_up_date,withdrawal_date,score from mod_users order by sign_up_date desc) order by sign_up_date desc) where r >= #{start} and r <= #{end}
